it.essepuntato.earmark.core.io
Interface EARMARKReader

All Superinterfaces:
EARMARKIOLogger
All Known Implementing Classes:
JenaReader
public interface EARMARKReader
extends EARMARKIOLogger

This interface defines methods for reading various representations of an EARMARK document, translating them in a proper Java object.

Author:
Silvio Peroni
